Text:
Classification: Documentary
Genre: History | Lifestyle
Status: New Series
Network: BBC TWO ( United Kingdom)
Airs: Fridays at 09:00 pm
Runtime: 60 Minutes
Premiere: September 28, 2012

Servants - The True Story Of Life Below Stairs is a documentary series which takes a look at how acentury ago, 1.5 million British people worked as servants. The series is presented by Pamela Cox. 
(http://www.tvrage.com/shows/id-32737)
